ViewObject.Name: XxcsoMonthListVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT '01' month_date ,'1ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '02' month_date ,'2ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '03' month_date ,'3ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '04' month_date ,'4ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '05' month_date ,'5ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '06' month_date ,'6ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '07' month_date ,'7ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '08' month_date ,'8ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '09' month_date ,'9ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '10' month_date ,'10ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '11' month_date ,'11ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '12' month_date ,'12ŒŽ' month_name FROM DUAL
